long_description: Honoring the very first Teva sandals ever made, the Teva Original Universal Sandals have traditional nylon webbing and durable rubber outsoles, making them as valuable today as they were 30 years ago. Nylon webbing straps adjust with rip-and-stick closures across ankle and forefoot; straps are padded underneath to relieve pressure. Anatomic EVA topsoles provide extra support and comfort; open-toe construction doesn't allow water to pool. Microban(R) zinc-based antimicrobial treatment helps control odors. Compression-molded EVA midsoles offer all-day cushioning. Teva Original Universal Sandals have durable rubber outsoles for good traction on wet surfaces.
short_description: Honoring the very first Teva sandals ever made, the Teva Original Universal Sandals have traditional nylon webbing and durable rubber outsoles, making them as valuable today as they were 30 years ago.
